__e: You're really prime, Ellen! You know that? I catch you screwing another guy, and you attack my lifestyle!
Excuse me. You have a girl on your bed, I catch you and I'm the bad guy?
I catch you breaking into the safe, then almost in bed with him.
What a day when I catch you out, and no story can help you.
If I catch you with my water again, you gonna have a problem outta me.
If you tell me his exact location I might be able to catch him.
And if I ever catch either one of you near one, knock you silly.
I'm telling you, if I catch you meddling in a police investigation again, I swear... heaven help you.
If I catch you again beers won't help you. is that clear?
